response.original_title: Metal Munching Maniacs: Robot Club & Grille MAYhem
response.overview: It's more metal-munching mayhem as battle-ready robots pinch, zap, smash and slice each other to bits in this collection of 38 fights from Robot Club and Grille MAYhem competitions. The competitions feature robots in the 1-120 pound weight classes. These weapon-laden machines were built with care by ingenious robotics inventors with a singular intent -- to destroy the competition. Also features contestant interviews and pit reports.
response.title: Metal Munching Maniacs: Robot Club & Grille MAYhem
